Confinement and social distancing, key measures in the control of the spread of SARS-CoV-2 during the first wave,
8 may have also had an impact on all other infectious diseases in the paediatric age group. These measures, along with the suspension of a large part of elective hospital-based services, have led to a striking decline in occupancy in many paediatric units. However, the suspension of all work- and school-related activities can hardly be sustained indefinitely,
9 and activities will need to resume gradually under epidemiological surveillance.
